response:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: You can use the following code to support all image formats:
```scss
File input = new File("digital_image_processing.jpg");
BufferedImage image = ImageIO.read(input);
File compressedImageFile = new File("compress.jpg");
OutputStream os = new FileOutputStream(compressedImageFile);

Iterator<ImageWriter> writers = ImageIO.getImageWritersByFormatName("*");
ImageWriter writer = (ImageWriter) writers.next();
ImageOutputStream ios = ImageIO.createImageOutputStream(os);
writer.setOutput(ios);
ImageWriteParam param = writer.getDefaultWriteParam();
param.setCompressionMode(ImageWriteParam.MODE_EXPLICIT);
param.setCompressionQuality(0.05f);
writer.write(null, new IIOImage(image, null, null), param);
```
Explanation:
The `getImageWritersByFormatName("*")` method returns an iterator of all available image writers, regardless of the image format. By casting the result of this method to `ImageWriter` and then calling the `next()` method on the iterator, you can get the first available image writer. This allows you to write any image format to a file using the same code.
